effects: Choose 3 targets and repeat for each:
Physical damage (0.7x, ATK) to one enemy
Reduce DEF and SPR by 45% for 3 turns to one enemy

Gain access to following skills for one turn:
	Swift Shot (910865)
name: Penetrating Shot

desc_short: Deal physical damage and reduce DEF and SPR for chosen enemies, and enable swift shot for one turn
對選定的敵人發動物理攻擊+降低防禦精神的數值+1回合內可以使用「急速連射」
물리 피해 부여+일부 선택된 적의 방어력과 정신력 감소+1턴 동안 '질속연사' 사용 가능
Inflige des dégâts physiques et réduit la DEF et la PSY des ennemis ciblés, et permet d'utiliser Tir ultra rapide pendant un tour
Fügt ausgewählten Gegnern phys. Schaden zu und verringert ihre ABW und PSY, ermöglicht eine Runde lang Flinker Schuss.
Inflige daño físico, reduce DEF y ESP de los enemigos que elijas y aprende Tiro rápido durante 1 turno
